name: Amerikanskiy
description:
Russians and americans are in a race against the clock to see who's the first nation to land on the moon. 

Help the comrads achieve victory!

Enjoy this re-imagination of the classic gameplay from Space Invaders on this action-packed awesome story between the USSR and the americans  with a plot-twist you won't believe!

How to play:

WASD - Arrows - Spacebar or Left Mouse Button - Shoot

The game has a checkpoint system so you start from where you last failed.

Let me know if you find any hidden references.

Assets used:

Dos88-Chiptune

Play from executable if you have any problem in the web version
